ygData.subject: Re: Why are you playing a SK
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I started off as a Barbarian Warrior on Innoruuk server, and then I decided to try out my Human Wizard. After realizing how big of a wuss my wizard was I
ygData.messageBody:
Well,


I started off as a Barbarian Warrior on Innoruuk server, and then I decided
to try out my Human Wizard. After realizing how big of a wuss my wizard was I
quit after level seven. When I first got the game I picked a Dark Elf Shadow
Knight, but it was confusing so I tried out about every race/class combo you
could. Finally I went back to my SK and I love it. The main reason I got it
is because of the sweet stats. They get VERY powerful at higher levels.

Amatai Cy
Second In Command - The Maelstrom
WWW.MWGL.NET
